name: Artist Representational, Renderer, EXP, Abstract
description:
you type, pressing ctrl-left-side parses the text.

recommended a controller, with 2 axises.

wasd qe rf & zx are the keyboard controls.

B on gamepad resets the camera, if held.

left joy, right joy, up and down dpad, & L2 R2.

The shaders are from my article on Dark Matter, through my PDF on Delusional Syndrome.

EB1 is ellipsis batch 1, first day's build.

no label is day 2.

EC1 is ellipsis karftre batch 1, third day's build. *

(* in this build, keyboard control for moving is removed.*)
